mapper.select: SELECT id, title, writer, DATE_FORMAT(start, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') start, DATE_FORMAT(end, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') end, ALLDAY, TEXTCOLOR, BACKGROUNDCOLOR, BORDERCOLOR FROM csworktools.calendar
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO csworktools.calendar (title, start, end, allDay, textColor, backgroundColor, borderColor) SELECT #{title}, #{start}, #{end}, #{allday}, 'yellow', 'navy', 'navy' FROM DUAL WHERE NOT EXISTS ( SELECT * FROM csworktools.calendar WHERE #{start} <= end AND #{end} >= start )
mapper.select: select count(*) from csworktools.calendar where start = #{start}
